Title: Giant ant
default: This creature is a colossal insect, standing as tall as a human with a glossy black exoskeleton. Its large mandibles are sharp and menacing, and it has six long, segmented legs each ending in a pointed foot. Its antennae twitch in the air, sensing its surroundings, and its compound eyes glint with a predatory intelligence.
default_short: This creature is an oversized, menacing ant with a shiny, black exoskeleton and large, powerful mandibles. Its six segmented legs and two antennae twitch with a sense of alertness and its abdomen is disproportionately large, giving it a fearsome appearance.
stability: A giant ant from the game NetHack is a large, intimidating insect with a segmented body. It has a dark red or brown color, with sharp, protruding mandibles and six long, jointed legs. The ant also has two antennae and a pointed abdomen.
technical: The object is a large, six-legged insect-like figure with a segmented body, divided into a head, thorax, and abdomen. It features two large, curved antennae protruding from the head and a set of mandibles. It is entirely monochromatic, presented in a dark, almost black, shade of grey.

Title: Killer bee
default: This creature is a small insect with a sleek, black and yellow striped body. It has two translucent wings, six spindly legs, and a pair of antennae. Its most prominent feature is a sharp, venomous stinger protruding from its rear.
default_short: This creature is a small, flying insect with a black and yellow striped abdomen, two transparent wings, and a prominent stinger. Its body is sleek and elongated, with six thin legs and a pair of antennae on its head.
stability: A small, oval-shaped insect with a sharp, pointed stinger at the rear. It has a yellow and black striped body, indicative of its dangerous nature. The bee has two translucent wings on its back and two small antennae on its head.
technical: The object is a small, winged insect-like figure, displayed as a 'b' character in the ASCII version of the game. It is primarily black, with yellow stripes across its body, mimicking the pattern of a real-world bee. It has a pair of antennae and a pointed stinger at the end of its segmented body.

Title: Soldier ant
default: This creature is a robust, medium-sized ant with a deep red exoskeleton. It possesses large, powerful mandibles and a pair of antennae that constantly move, scanning its surroundings. Despite its small size, its stance and movements exude a sense of alertness and readiness for combat.
default_short: This creature is a large, reddish-brown ant with formidable mandibles and a hardened exoskeleton. It stands upright on its six segmented legs, displaying a pair of antennae and a menacing, aggressive posture.
stability: A Soldier Ant from the game NetHack is a small, six-legged insect with a distinct segmented body. It is primarily black in colour with a glossy finish. The ant's defining features include its large mandibles, antennae, and a sturdy thorax.
technical: This object appears as a small, pixelated figure, roughly ant-shaped and compact with a segmented body. It has six short legs and a pair of antennae protruding from its head. It is uniformly black in color.

Title: Fire ant
default: This creature is a small, vibrant red insect, known for its distinctive segmented body and sharp pincers. It has a pair of thin, translucent wings that flicker with an inner flame. Its abdomen, unlike a regular ant, appears to glow from within, as if it contains a fiery core.
default_short: This creature is a small, vibrant red ant with an oversized abdomen, emitting a faint glow due to its fiery nature. Its mandibles appear particularly sharp and its legs are sturdy, built for both combat and rapid movement.
stability: A small, six-legged insect creature from the game NetHack, the Fire ant is fiery red in color. It has two antennae on its head and a segmented body. It's known for its aggressive behavior and ability to breathe fire.
technical: The object is small and segmented, resembling an ant with a distinct head, thorax, and abdomen. It is depicted in a vibrant, fiery red hue. It has six thin legs and two antennae, all of which are the same bright red color.

Title: Giant beetle
default: This creature is a colossal insect with a hard, glossy exoskeleton that gleams darkly under light. Its six spindly legs are attached to a segmented body, featuring a pair of robust mandibles and two antennae on its head. Its shell is domed and segmented, resembling a natural armor, and it carries an intimidating presence with its large size.
default_short: This creature is an enormous, six-legged insect with a glossy, dark exoskeleton and large, powerful mandibles. Its body is segmented with two prominent antennae on its head and a pair of hard, shell-like wings on its back.
stability: A large, intimidating beetle with a hard, shiny black exoskeleton. It has a pair of robust, powerful mandibles and six legs, each ending in sharp claws. Its wings are folded neatly on its back, with a hint of iridescence.
technical: The object is a large, six-legged creature with a pair of long, curved antennae and a robust, segmented body. It has a glossy, dark-brown carapace that is almost black, which is divided into two main parts: a smaller section for the head and thorax, and a larger one for the abdomen. Its body is oval-shaped and heavily armored, with a noticeable sheen, and it has a pair of large, powerful mandibles at the front.

Title: Queen bee
default: This creature is a large, robust insect with a golden-yellow and black striped abdomen, a set of translucent wings, and a distinctive pointed stinger. Its body is segmented into three parts: the head, thorax, and a particularly elongated abdomen. Its head features two large, compound eyes and a pair of antennae.
default_short: This entity is a large, robust insect with a distinct yellow and black striped abdomen, two transparent wings, and six legs. It possesses a prominent, pointed stinger at the end of its body.
stability: The Queen bee is a small, oval-shaped object, predominantly yellow in color. It features two black stripes on its body, two transparent wings, and a pointed stinger at the end. The Queen bee is distinctive for its crown-like structure on top of its head.
technical: This object is a small, round entity with a pointed end, resembling the typical shape of a bee. It is primarily yellow in colour, with black stripes around its body to mimic the appearance of a real queen bee. The object also features two small, black antennae and a pair of wings on its back.

Title: Acid blob
default: This entity appears as a semi-transparent, gelatinous mass with a greenish hue, constantly shifting and undulating. Its surface glistens with a corrosive substance that seems to eat away at anything it touches. Despite its lack of discernible features, it gives off an unsettling aura, as if aware and purposeful.
default_short: This entity appears as a semi-transparent, amorphous blob with a constantly shifting surface, emitting a faint greenish glow. Its gelatinous body seems to ripple and bubble, hinting at the corrosive acid contained within.
stability: A round, jelly-like creature that is bright green in color, resembling a blob of acid. It has a semi-transparent body with a glossy surface that appears to be constantly shifting and bubbling. The blob lacks any distinct features such as eyes or limbs.
technical: This object appears as a pulsating, semi-transparent sphere with a slightly irregular shape, hinting at its gelatinous nature. Its color fluctuates between various shades of green, from bright neon to deep forest, indicating its corrosive nature. It is devoid of any carried items or additional appendages, maintaining a simple, rounded form.

Title: Quivering blob
default: This entity appears as a gelatinous, semi-transparent mass, constantly in motion with an unsettling, pulsating rhythm. Its form is amorphous and ever-changing, making it difficult to discern any distinct features. Its surface shimmers with a slick sheen, reflecting light in odd, unpredictable patterns.
default_short: The entity appears as a pulsating, gelatinous mass, constantly changing in size and shape, with a translucent and slimy surface. Its color fluctuates between various shades of green and yellow.
stability: A quivering blob from the game NetHack is a semi-transparent, jelly-like entity with an amorphous, constantly shifting form. It is primarily light green in color with a shiny, gelatinous texture. It lacks any distinct features such as eyes, mouth, or limbs.
technical: This object appears as a pulsating, amorphous mass with no distinct shape or edges. Its semi-translucent body exudes a sickly greenish-yellow hue. Despite its constant movement, it maintains a relatively compact size, never growing too large or shrinking too small.

Title: Gelatinous cube
default: This entity appears as a large, transparent cube that shimmers slightly, making it difficult to discern unless closely observed. Despite its seemingly soft and jelly-like texture, it maintains a perfect cubic form, with each side measuring approximately the height of an average human. Within its clear, gelatinous body, one can occasionally see the remnants of its previous meals, like bones or pieces of equipment, suspended as if in amber.
default_short: This entity appears as a large, transparent cube of jelly-like substance, which engulfs anything it comes into contact with. Despite its simple, amorphous shape, it's surprisingly menacing due to its size and the eerie way it moves.
stability: A Gelatinous cube is a large, transparent cube with a gel-like consistency from the game NetHack. It is completely clear, making it almost invisible, with the only hint of its presence being the occasional shimmer or the floating items it has engulfed. It's a perfect cube, measuring the same size on all sides.
technical: The object is a perfectly symmetrical, translucent cube with a slightly bluish tint. It has a smooth, jelly-like surface that seems to undulate slightly, giving it a pulsating appearance. The cube is completely solid and featureless, without any visible appendages or facial features.

Title: Chickatrice
default: This creature appears as a small, feathered bird, resembling a cross between a chicken and a basilisk. Its beady eyes hold an eerie, petrifying gaze, and its beak is sharp and pointed. It possesses a pair of wings, and its body is covered in an array of plumage that ranges from grey to white.
default_short: This creature appears as a small bird with the body of a chicken and the head of a cockatrice, featuring a beak, crest, and wattles. Its feathers are primarily white, but its head, neck, and tail have green scales, and it has sharp talons on its feet.
stability: A Chickatrice is a small, bird-like creature from NetHack. It has a combination of chicken and basilisk features, with a predominantly yellow body, a pair of wings, sharp claws, and a snake-like tail. Its most defining characteristic is its gaze, which is said to turn beings into stone, so depict it with intense, glowing eyes.
technical: The object is a small, two-legged creature with a compact body shape, bearing a resemblance to a hybrid between a chicken and a basilisk. It is predominantly yellow in colour, with hints of grey on its wings and tail. It has a pair of small, beady red eyes and a sharp, pointed beak.

Title: Cockatrice
default: Resembling a grotesque blend of bird and reptile, this creature boasts a rooster's body with scales instead of feathers, and a lizard-like tail. Its beady eyes are surrounded by a crown of spiky scales, adding to its menacing look. It possesses a pair of bat-like wings and sharp talons, both equally deadly.
default_short: This creature appears as a small, grotesque bird with bat-like wings, reptilian scales, and a rooster's head. Its most distinctive feature is its eyes, which are large, glowing, and hypnotic.
stability: A Cockatrice from NetHack is a small, bird-like creature with reptilian features. It has bright yellow scales, a pair of bat-like wings, and a long tail. Its most defining characteristic is its gaze, which is known to turn things into stone.
technical: The object is a small, bird-like creature with a lizard's tail, standing on two clawed feet. Its body is covered in scales and feathers, both of which are a dull, greyish-brown colour. It has a sharp beak, a pair of wings folded at its sides, and its eyes are small and bead-like.

Title: Pyrolisk
default: This creature appears as a large, fiery bird with a vibrant red and orange plumage that seems to flicker and glow like flames. Its eyes are bright yellow, akin to burning coals, and its sharp beak and talons are a contrasting black. When it spreads its wings, they mimic the appearance of a fierce, raging inferno.
default_short: This creature resembles a large, red bird with a fiery plumage and piercing, glowing eyes. It has a sharp beak, clawed feet, and its wings are ablaze with an ethereal fire that doesn't seem to harm it.
stability: A Pyrolisk is a mythical bird-like creature, similar to a phoenix, predominantly red in color with hints of orange and yellow, symbolizing fire. It has large, majestic wings, a long, pointed beak, and sharp claws. The creature is often portrayed surrounded by flames or sparks, emphasizing its fiery nature.
technical: The object is a bird-like creature with a plump, round body, and two short legs. It has a pair of wide, spread-out wings and a long, pointed beak. The entire creature is depicted in a fiery red colour.

Title: Jackal
default: This creature is a medium-sized carnivorous mammal with a lean body, long legs, and a bushy tail. It has a pointed snout, sharp teeth, and large, alert ears. Its fur is typically a tawny color, blending seamlessly into the arid environments it often inhabits.
default_short: This creature is a medium-sized, four-legged canine with a slender body, a bushy tail, and pointed ears. It has a tawny coat with lighter underparts and a dark back, and its eyes gleam with a cunning intelligence.
stability: The Jackal object is a small, quadrupedal creature with a slender body and a long tail, similar in appearance to a real-world jackal. It has a golden-brown coat and sharp, white teeth visible in its slightly open mouth. Its eyes are alert and its ears are pointed, giving it a vigilant and cunning look.
technical: This object is a small, quadrupedal creature, roughly the size of a medium dog, with a slender body and a long, bushy tail. It is covered in short, coarse fur that is a dusty brown or sandy colour, blending well with a desert or savannah environment. Its sharp, pointed ears are pricked upwards, and its snout is elongated, filled with small but sharp teeth.

Title: Fox
default: This creature is a small, nimble quadruped with a sleek coat of reddish-brown fur. It has a pointed snout, sharp teeth, and keen, intelligent eyes that are usually a bright shade of amber. Its most distinctive feature is its bushy tail, often tipped with white, which is almost as long as its body.
default_short: This creature is a small, quadrupedal mammal with a pointed snout, bushy tail, and reddish-brown fur. Its eyes are sharp and alert, conveying a sense of cunning.
stability: A fox from NetHack is a small, quadrupedal creature with pointed ears and a bushy tail. It is primarily orange in color, with white areas around the mouth, chest, and tip of the tail. The fox has bright, alert eyes and a sharp, pointed snout.
technical: This object is a small, quadrupedal creature with a slender body, a pointed snout, and a bushy tail. It is primarily covered in a bright orange or red fur, with lighter, almost white fur on its underbelly. Its tail is tipped with white, and it has sharp, pointed ears that are usually erect.

Title: Coyote
default: This creature resembles a medium-sized canine with a slim, agile body, covered in tawny-grey fur. It possesses sharp, pointed ears and a bushy tail, and its yellow eyes gleam with a cunning intelligence. Its narrow snout is filled with sharp teeth, used for tearing into its prey.
default_short: This creature is a medium-sized canine with a slender, agile body, covered in grayish-brown fur. It has pointed ears, sharp teeth, a bushy tail, and bright, intelligent eyes.
stability: A coyote from the game NetHack is a medium-sized, quadrupedal creature with a slender body. It has a brownish-grey fur coat, pointed ears, sharp teeth visible in its open mouth, and a bushy tail. Its eyes are bright and alert, reflecting its cunning nature in the game.
technical: The object is a quadrupedal figure, similar to a canine in shape, with a pointed snout and a bushy tail. It is represented in a simplistic, pixelated style that lacks detailed features. The object is uniformly brown in colour.

Title: Werejackal were
default: This entity appears as a humanoid figure with distinct jackal-like features, including pointed ears, a snout, and a bushy tail. Its body is covered in coarse, tawny fur and it stands upright on two legs, with clawed hands held out in front. Its eyes glow with a menacing yellow light, revealing a savage and cunning intelligence.
default_short: This creature resembles a humanoid jackal, standing upright on two legs, with a muscular build, sharp claws, and a canine-like head with piercing eyes. It has a coat of short, coarse fur, ranging in color from tawny to grey, and a long, bushy tail.
stability: A Werejackal is a mythical creature with a hybrid form between a human and a jackal. It has a humanoid structure with the head of a jackal, covered in coarse, brownish-grey fur. It stands upright, with clawed hands and feet, sharp teeth, and glowing yellow eyes.
technical: This object appears as a small, quadrupedal creature with a slender, elongated body. It has a pointed snout, upright ears, and a bushy tail, all features reminiscent of a jackal but with a slightly humanoid structure. It is entirely covered in brown fur.

Title: Little dog
default: This is a small canine creature, likely a puppy, with a short, sleek coat that varies from light to dark shades. Its tail is wagging excitedly and its eyes are bright and alert. Despite its small size, it carries a sense of vitality and eagerness.
default_short: This is a small, four-legged canine with a short coat, likely a puppy due to its size. Its features are simple and undetailed, reflecting the pixelated, monochromatic design typical of early computer graphics.
stability: A small, four-legged creature with a compact, lean body. It is primarily brown in color, with a slightly darker brown tail and ears. The dog has bright, alert eyes, a small black nose, and a friendly, open-mouthed expression.
technical: The object is small and quadrupedal, resembling a canine in shape. It has a short tail and pointed ears. The object is primarily a light brown or tan colour.

Title: Dog
default: This entity appears as a medium-sized quadruped with a sleek, short-haired coat that varies in shades from light to dark brown. It has a long tail that wags enthusiastically, and its alert ears perk up at the slightest sound. Its eyes are bright and intelligent, while its mouth, often open in a pant, reveals a pink tongue and sharp white teeth.
default_short: This entity appears as a small to medium-sized quadruped with a tail, depicted in a simplistic, monochrome pixel art style. It has pointed ears, a round body, and is generally represented by a 'd' character in a text-based environment.
stability: A medium-sized, four-legged creature with a tail, resembling a typical dog. It should have a brown fur coat with discernible eyes, ears, and a snout. The dog appears friendly and energetic, as typical for dogs in NetHack.

Title: Large dog
default: This is a sizable canine with a strong, muscular build, its coat varying in shades from light to dark. Its ears are perky, indicating alertness, and its eyes gleam with intelligence. The broad chest and powerful legs suggest a creature capable of great speed and strength.
default_short: This creature is a sizable canine with a robust and muscular body, covered in thick fur. It has a broad head with alert eyes, a strong jaw with sharp teeth, and a long, bushy tail.
stability: The large dog object is a medium-sized quadruped creature, similar in shape to a Labrador or German Shepherd. It is primarily brown in color with a slightly darker muzzle and tail. The dog features a friendly expression, prominent ears, and a wagging tail.
technical: The object is a sizable, quadrupedal figure with a streamlined body shape, suggesting a canine form. It has a pointed snout, floppy ears, and a long, slightly curved tail. Its pixelated representation is predominantly brown, with varying shades indicating fur texture.

Title: Dingo

It has a sandy, yellowish-brown coat that helps it blend into arid environments, and its pricked ears and sharp, intelligent eyes give it an alert and wary expression. Its strong jaws and lean, muscular body hint at its capabilities as a predator.
default_short: This creature resembles a medium-sized, lean dog with a bushy tail, coated in sandy or yellowish-brown fur. Its features include pointed ears, a long snout, and sharp teeth visible when its mouth is open.
stability: A medium-sized, dog-like creature with a lean, muscular body. It has a sandy or yellowish-brown coat, pricked ears, and a bushy tail. It is agile, alert, and often depicted in a stance ready to pounce or run.
technical: The object is a medium-sized, four-legged creature with a lean, muscular body. It has a bushy tail, pointed ears and a long snout, all rendered in a simple, pixelated style. Its colour palette is a range of tans and browns, giving it a realistic, earthy appearance.

It has sharp teeth visible within its snout, piercing yellow eyes, and large, pointed ears perked up on its head. Its tail is bushy, and it carries a powerful, agile physique that suggests it's built for hunting.

stability: A medium-sized quadruped creature with sharp teeth and a bushy tail. It has a grey fur coat, bright yellow eyes, and large pointed ears. The wolf looks agile and ferocious, embodying its predatory nature in the game NetHack.
technical: The object is a quadrupedal figure, medium-sized and elongated, with a pointed snout and a bushy tail. It is rendered in a simple, pixelated style, with the majority of its body being a monochromatic grey. Title: Werewolf were
default: This creature appears as a bipedal wolf, standing upright on its hind legs. It has a muscular build, with a coat of dense, dark fur, sharp claws on its hands and feet, and a snarling mouth filled with large, predatory teeth. Its eyes glow a menacing yellow, adding to its fearsome and supernatural appearance.
default_short: This entity appears as a humanoid figure with sharp claws, covered in thick, shaggy fur. Its face is distinctly lupine, featuring pointed ears, a snout, and glowing eyes.
stability: A Werewolf from NetHack is a humanoid creature with a muscular build, standing on two legs. It has sharp claws, pointed ears, and a snout, all covered in thick, dark grey or black fur. technical: The object appears as a humanoid figure with a hunched posture, covered in dark grey or black fur, and features distinctly lupine characteristics such as a snout, pointed ears, and sharp claws. Its eyes are a bright, glowing yellow, adding a menacing look. The body shape is muscular and the overall size is larger than a typical human, but smaller than most monsters in the game.

Title: Warg
default: This creature appears as a large, fierce wolf with sharp, menacing teeth and glowing red eyes. Its muscular body is covered in thick, matted grey fur, and it moves with a predatory grace. Its powerful jaws and claws hint at its deadly combat abilities.

stability: A Warg is a large, wolf-like creature from the game NetHack. It has a muscular body with sharp claws and teeth, and a thick, grey fur coat. Its eyes are piercing red, giving it an intimidating and fearsome appearance.
technical: This object appears as a large, quadrupedal creature with a muscular build, resembling a wolf in shape. It has a thick, shaggy coat that is a greyish-brown colour. Its eyes are depicted as two white pixels, giving it a menacing look.

Title: Winter wolf cub
default: This small creature is covered in a thick, snowy white fur, perfect for blending into a winter landscape. Its piercing blue eyes are full of curiosity and it has sharp, tiny teeth visible when it opens its mouth. Its body is lithe and agile, with a bushy tail and large paws designed for navigating through snowy terrains.
default_short: This small creature has thick, snow-white fur and piercing blue eyes, with a lean, muscular body built for survival in harsh winter conditions. Its sharp teeth and claws are clearly visible, even at its young age, hinting at its predatory nature.
stability: A small, quadrupedal creature with sharp features and pointed ears similar to a wolf cub. It has a thick, snowy white fur coat for the winter, with piercing blue eyes. Its paws and snout are slightly darker, almost grey, and it looks playful yet alert.
technical: The object appears as a small, quadrupedal creature, featuring a compact, robust body covered in thick, snowy white fur. Its eyes are two tiny, vibrant points, emitting a fierce icy-blue glow. It also has a fluffy tail, small rounded ears, and a snout with sharp teeth visible, all of which are proportionate to its small body size.

Title: Winter wolf
default: This creature is a large, powerful wolf with snow-white fur that almost glows in the cold winter light. Its eyes are a piercing icy blue, and its sharp teeth are visible even when its mouth is closed. Its muscular body is built for survival in harsh climates, with a thick coat of fur and a bushy tail that wraps around its body for warmth.
default_short: This creature is a large, powerful wolf with pure white fur and icy blue eyes, exuding an aura of cold. It possesses sharp, gleaming teeth and claws that appear capable of tearing through flesh and bone with ease.
stability: A winter wolf from NetHack is a large, quadrupedal creature with a thick, pure white fur coat. It has glowing blue eyes, sharp fangs, and large paws. The wolf emits a cold aura, visually represented by a subtle blue glow or frosty particles around it.
technical: The object is a quadrupedal creature, similar in size and shape to a large dog, with a long bushy tail. It has a thick, snowy white fur coat that covers its entire body. Its eyes are piercing blue, and it has a sharp, pointed snout filled with visible fangs.

Title: Hell hound pup
default: This creature appears as a small, muscular canine, with deep red, almost black, fur that seems to emit a faint glow. Its eyes are a blazing orange, radiating a menacing light, while sharp, white fangs peek out from its snarling mouth. Wisps of smoke occasionally drift from its nostrils, hinting at a fiery breath within.
default_short: This creature appears as a small, muscular dog with sleek, black fur, glowing red eyes, and sharp teeth. It has a pair of curled horns on its head and its body radiates a faint, fiery aura.
stability: A Hell hound pup from NetHack is a small, canine-like creature with a fiery red and orange colour scheme, symbolising its association with fire. It has sharp teeth, glowing eyes, and a menacing appearance. The body is sleek and muscular, emitting a slight glow as if it's smouldering from within.
technical: The object appears as a small, four-legged creature with a sleek, muscular build, sharp claws, and pointed ears. Its fur is a vivid shade of red, bordering on orange, and its eyes glow a bright, fiery yellow. Title: Hell hound
default: This creature appears as a large, menacing dog with fiery red eyes and smoke curling from its nostrils. Its dark, sleek fur seems to absorb light, giving it an ominous, shadowy appearance. default_short: This creature is a large, muscular dog with glowing red eyes and dark, smoky fur that appears to be perpetually ablaze. Its menacing snarl reveals sharp, white fangs, and its tail is long and whip-like, flickering with an ethereal, fiery glow.
stability: A Hell hound from NetHack is a medium-sized, menacing dog-like creature with sharp claws and teeth. The Hell hound's eyes are a glowing yellow, and it is often depicted surrounded by an aura of heat or small licks of fire.
technical: This object is a medium-sized, four-legged creature with a sleek, muscular build. It has glowing red eyes, sharp teeth, and its entire body is enveloped in bright, flickering flames. Its fur, visible beneath the fire, is a deep, charcoal black.

Title: Cerberus
default: This creature is a massive, intimidating hound with three distinct heads, each bearing a set of sharp, menacing teeth. Its body is muscular and covered in thick, dark fur, and it has a long, serpentine tail. Each of its eyes glows with an eerie red light, adding to its overall fearsome appearance.
default_short: This entity is a large, menacing three-headed dog with a muscular build, sharp claws, and glowing red eyes. Its body is covered in dark, coarse fur and each of its mouths is filled with razor-sharp teeth.
stability: A three-headed dog-like creature, Cerberus, from the game NetHack. It has a muscular body, sharp claws, and its fur is primarily black with hints of dark red. Each head has glowing red eyes and a menacing snarl, displaying rows of sharp teeth.
technical: This object appears as a large, three-headed dog, each head possessing menacing, glowing red eyes. Its body is muscular and covered in dark, coarse fur, with a long tail that is tipped with a serpent's head. Its stance is aggressive, with sharp claws digging into the ground and bared fangs in each of its three mouths.

Title: Gas spore
default: This object appears as a floating, translucent orb filled with a greenish, gaseous substance. Its surface is smooth and slightly luminescent, casting an eerie glow. Thin tendrils, almost like roots, dangle from its underside, wafting gently as if moved by an unseen current.
default_short: This object appears as a floating, translucent sphere filled with swirling gas, and is about the size of a human head. Its surface is slightly luminescent, casting a faint glow in its immediate surroundings.
stability: A gas spore from NetHack is a small, spherical object with a simple design. It is primarily orange in color with a few red spots scattered across its surface. The spore has a glossy texture, resembling a floating, inflated balloon.
technical: This object appears as a floating, spherical entity, roughly the size of a small beach ball. It has a translucent surface that reveals a cloud-like substance inside, glowing with a soft, green luminescence. The sphere is otherwise unadorned, with no visible features or appendages.

Title: Floating eye
default: A solitary, spherical entity hovers mid-air, its entire surface dominated by a single, large, unblinking eyeball. It possesses a glossy, vibrant blue skin, contrasting starkly with its bright, yellow iris. The pupil at the center is a deep black void, absorbing all light and exuding an eerie sense of omniscience.
default_short: It's a solitary, disembodied eyeball that levitates in mid-air. The iris in the center is a vibrant blue, and the whole eye is surrounded by a translucent, shimmering aura.
stability: A floating eye object from the game NetHack is a spherical, hovering entity. It is primarily blue in colour, with a large, centrally-located eye that is white with a black pupil. The entity has a slightly translucent, ethereal appearance, giving it a ghostly, supernatural look.
technical: This object appears as a singular, spherical entity, devoid of any appendages or additional features. It is characterized by a uniform, bright blue hue that covers its entire surface. Title: Freezing sphere

Title: Large kobold
default: This creature appears as a slightly bigger, reptilian humanoid, standing around 3 feet tall with a robust body. It has a tough, greenish-brown scaly skin, sharp claws, and a snout-like face with gleaming red eyes. It's hunched over, with a long, tapering tail trailing behind, and it wields a small weapon, possibly a dagger or a short sword.
default_short: This creature appears as a slightly larger than average, humanoid reptile with greenish-brown scales, sharp claws, and glowing red eyes. It stands upright, wielding a small weapon and wearing tattered clothing.
stability: A large kobold is a humanoid creature standing at around 4 feet tall. It has reptilian features, greenish-brown scaly skin, yellow eyes, and sharp teeth. It is often depicted wielding primitive weapons, such as a spear or a club.
technical: This object appears as a small, reptilian humanoid standing upright, featuring scales that range from dark brown to black. It has a lean, compact build, with sharp claws on its hands and feet, and a long, tapering tail. Its eyes are beady and yellow, set into a pointed, snout-like face with small, sharp teeth visible.

Title: Kobold lord
default: This creature appears as a small, reptilian humanoid with scales covering its body, standing at about the height of a human child. It has beady red eyes, sharp claws, and a long, tapering tail. It wears a crown on its head, signifying its status, and wields a short sword in one hand.
default_short: This entity is a small, reptilian humanoid with scaly skin, sharp claws, and glowing red eyes, adorned in regal attire signifying leadership. It carries a weapon, typically a spear or sword, and has a hunched posture.
stability: A Kobold Lord from NetHack is a small humanoid creature with reptilian characteristics. It has a dark green skin tone, sharp teeth, glowing red eyes, and is usually depicted wielding a short sword and a shield. Its attire consists of dark, rugged clothing and it has a menacing, cunning look on its face.
technical: This object is a small, humanoid figure with reptilian characteristics, standing upright with a slightly hunched posture. It has a rough, scaly texture, and its predominant colour is a dark, earthy brown. The figure features sharp, pointed ears, a snout-like nose, and a tail, with its hands and feet ending in claw-like digits.

Title: Kobold shaman
default: This creature is a small, reptilian humanoid standing around 2 to 3 feet tall with a hunched posture. It has a scaly, blue-gray skin and large, yellow eyes that shine with a cunning intelligence. It is adorned in simple tribal robes and carries a gnarled staff, from which it emits powerful magical energy.
default_short: This creature is a small, reptilian humanoid with scaly skin, sharp claws, and glowing red eyes, wearing a simple robe and carrying a staff adorned with mystical symbols. It has a hunched posture and a menacing, toothy grin, exuding an aura of primitive magic.
stability: A Kobold Shaman from NetHack is a small, reptilian humanoid creature with a dark, bluish-grey skin tone. It wears tribal shaman attire, including a feathered headdress, bone necklace, and carries a magical staff. Its eyes glow red, indicating its magical prowess.
technical: This object appears as a small, humanoid creature with reptilian features, standing on two legs. It has a dark blue skin tone, with bright red eyes. It is dressed in simple, ragged clothing, but is not carrying any items.

Title: Leprechaun
default: This small, humanoid figure stands at about two feet tall, with a mischievous glint in its bright green eyes. It is dressed in traditional Irish garb, including a green suit, buckled shoes, and a tall hat, all of which contrast sharply with its fiery red beard. In one hand, it clutches a wooden shillelagh, while the other hand holds a pot overflowing with shiny gold coins.
default_short: This object is a small, humanoid figure with a green suit, pointed shoes, and a tall hat, all typical of Irish folklore. It is often depicted with a mischievous grin and holding a pot of gold.
stability: A small humanoid figure with a distinctive green suit and hat, carrying a large pot of gold. It has red hair, a beard, and a mischievous smile. The Leprechaun is known for its cunning and magical abilities.
technical: This object appears as a small humanoid figure, roughly the same height as a dwarf, with a distinctive pointy hat. It is primarily dressed in vibrant green attire, featuring a coat, trousers, and shoes. The figure's skin is pale, and it has a beard, giving it an aged appearance.

Title: Small mimic
default: This entity appears as a small, ordinary object, like a chest or a piece of furniture, blending seamlessly with its surroundings. Its amorphous, gelatinous body can shift and change to mimic almost anything. Despite its deceptive appearance, a hint of its true form can sometimes be seen, especially when it moves, revealing a slightly shimmering, fluid-like surface.
default_short: This entity appears as a small, amorphous shape with a glossy, gelatinous texture. It has the ability to alter its form and color to mimic any object it encounters, making its appearance highly variable.
stability: A small mimic object from the NetHack game, resembling a tiny chest or box. It has a brownish colour with a slightly darker outline, giving it a 3D effect. Notable features include a keyhole and possible tiny hinges, indicating its function as a container.
technical: This object appears as a small, rectangular prism, akin to a closed box, with a uniform grey colour. It has no discernible features or markings on any of its surfaces. Despite its simple and unadorned appearance, it seems to possess a subtle, uncanny quality.

Title: Large mimic
default: This entity appears as a sizable, amorphous creature, its form shifting and undulating as it mimics various objects around it. Its body is slick and glossy, with a color that changes depending on what it's imitating. Despite its shape-shifting abilities, it maintains a consistent size, always larger than most common objects it copies.
default_short: This entity appears as a sizable, indistinguishable object until disturbed, at which point it morphs into a massive, amorphous creature with pseudopods that mimic the texture and color of its surroundings. Its body is gelatinous and constantly shifting, making it difficult to discern its true form.
stability: A large mimic object from the NetHack game is a shape-shifting entity, often resembling a large chest. It is predominantly brown with a slightly textured surface, with a keyhole and two hinges visible on the front. It has two red eyes and a wide mouth with sharp teeth, giving it a menacing appearance.
technical: The object is a large, rectangular entity, closely resembling a sizeable wooden chest or wardrobe. It features a rich, deep brown hue with lighter accents imitating wood grain. Despite its inanimate appearance, it occasionally shifts slightly, betraying its mimic nature.

Title: Giant mimic
default: This entity appears as a colossal, grotesque figure, resembling a distorted human with exaggerated features. Its skin has a wooden texture, imitating a chest or other common object, and its mouth is filled with sharp, jagged teeth. Despite its immense size, it maintains an eerie stillness, blending into its surroundings until disturbed.
default_short: This entity appears as a colossal, wooden chest with an unusually large, hinged lid. Its design is deceivingly simple, belying its true nature, with a smooth, polished surface and iron-bound edges.
stability: A Giant Mimic is a large, cube-shaped creature from NetHack. It's primarily brown, resembling a wooden treasure chest with a large, menacing mouth filled with sharp white teeth. It has two appendages that look like arms, ending in claw-like hands.
technical: This object appears as an oversized, shape-shifting entity, constantly morphing and changing its form to mimic its surroundings. Its colour is non-specific, altering to match the hues of whatever it's imitating at the time. It lacks any distinct or constant features due to its mimicking nature, making it hard to distinguish from the environment.

Title: Wood nymph
default: This entity appears as a ethereal female figure, adorned in a dress made of leaves and vines, with skin as rough and textured as tree bark. Her eyes glimmer with a mysterious green hue, mirroring the lush foliage of the forest. Her hair cascades down like a waterfall, intertwining with flowers and twigs, and her feet are bare, connecting her to the earth beneath.
default_short: This entity appears as a humanoid female with delicate, elfin features, draped in foliage and flowers that blend seamlessly with the surrounding forest. Her skin has a subtle, greenish hue, and her eyes sparkle with a mysterious, otherworldly light.
stability: A Wood nymph from NetHack is a humanoid figure with feminine features, standing upright. She is predominantly green, symbolizing her affinity with nature, and is often depicted with leafy or floral adornments. Her defining characteristics include a serene expression, long flowing hair, and she often carries a wooden staff or flute.
technical: This object appears as a small, humanoid figure with delicate, feminine features. It is rendered in varying shades of green, mimicking the colours of a forest, with long, flowing lines suggesting the shape of a dress made from leaves. The object's hair is also green and appears to blend seamlessly into the leaf-like texture of the dress.

Title: Water nymph
default: A shimmering, ethereal figure of a woman made entirely of water, her form constantly flowing and changing. She glows with a soft blue light, her long hair appearing as cascading waterfalls. Her eyes are deep pools of azure, and she moves with a grace that is both human and fluid.
default_short: This entity appears as a female figure made entirely of water, with flowing, wavy hair that mimics the movement of the sea. Her eyes shimmer like tranquil pools and her body, though humanoid in shape, constantly shifts and ripples as if made of liquid.
stability: A Water nymph from NetHack is a humanoid figure with feminine features, primarily in shades of blue to represent water. She has long flowing hair that resembles waterfalls and is often depicted with a mischievous expression. She carries a small harp and is usually shown partially submerged in water.
technical: The object appears as a small, humanoid figure, roughly the size of a human child. Its body is comprised entirely of a shimmering, translucent blue substance, resembling water in both colour and consistency. The figure lacks any discernible features or clothing, maintaining a simplistic, smooth form throughout.

Title: Mountain nymph
default: This ethereal creature appears as a beautiful woman, her skin shimmering with an earthy glow. She is adorned in garments woven from moss and leaves, and her hair cascades like a waterfall, interspersed with small pebbles and wildflowers. Her eyes hold a mischievous glint, and she moves with a grace that echoes the natural flow of the mountain landscape.
default_short: This creature appears as a beautiful, ethereal woman with earth-toned skin and hair, adorned in natural elements like flowers and leaves. Her form is semi-transparent, suggesting her supernatural origin, and she moves with a graceful, floating gait.
stability: A Mountain nymph from NetHack is a humanoid figure with feminine features. She is usually depicted in light brown or earthy tones, blending with the mountainous background. She is recognized for her ethereal beauty, often shown with long flowing hair, and carries a musical instrument, like a flute or a harp.
technical: This object appears as a small, humanoid figure with a feminine silhouette, distinguished by its ethereal, semi-transparent form. Its colour palette is dominated by earthy tones, such as browns and greens, blending seamlessly with the mountainous backdrop. The figure is devoid of any carried objects, further emphasizing its minimalist, elemental aesthetic.

Title: Goblin
default: This creature is small in stature, standing roughly half the height of an average human, with a hunched posture and green, warty skin. Its large, pointed ears stick out from the sides of its head, above a face dominated by a wide mouth filled with sharp teeth and beady red eyes. It is typically seen wearing ragged clothing and wielding crude weapons.
default_short: This creature is small and green with pointy ears, sharp teeth, and glowing red eyes. It's dressed in ragged clothes and carries a crude weapon, such as a club or dagger.
stability: A small, humanoid creature with green skin, large pointed ears, and sharp teeth. The Goblin is often depicted wearing ragged clothes and carrying a crude weapon, such as a club or dagger. Its eyes should be red and it should have a menacing expression.
technical: This object is a small, humanoid figure with a distinct hunched posture, featuring pointed ears and a somewhat grotesque face. It has a greenish hue, symbolizing its characteristic skin colour. The figure is unadorned, carrying no weapons or items, and it stands on two feet with its arms hanging at its sides.

Title: Hobgoblin
default: This creature appears as a small, goblin-like humanoid with a hunched posture, rough, greenish-brown skin, and sharp, yellow teeth. It has large, pointed ears, beady red eyes, and is often depicted wearing ragged clothing or armor. In its hands, it typically wields a crude weapon such as a club or dagger.
default_short: This creature is a humanoid figure, slightly smaller than an average human, with greenish-brown skin, pointed ears, and sharp teeth. It is clad in simple, ragged clothing and often carries a crude weapon or tool.
stability: A Hobgoblin from NetHack is a small, humanoid creature with a muscular build. It has greenish skin, pointed ears, sharp teeth, and is typically seen wearing brown or grey ragged clothing. This creature often carries a club or similar weapon.
technical: The object is humanoid in shape, slightly smaller than average human size, with a hunched posture. It has rough, greenish-brown skin and sharp, pointed features, including ears and teeth. It's depicted with menacing, glowing red eyes.

Title: Orc
default: This creature stands hunched, with greenish, rough skin and small, beady red eyes. Its large, muscular frame is adorned with rudimentary leather armor and it wields a crude, heavy club. It has prominent, sharp tusks protruding from its lower jaw, giving it a fearsome appearance.
default_short: This creature is a humanoid with greenish skin, large muscles, and sharp tusks protruding from its lower jaw. It has small, beady eyes, a flat nose, and is often depicted wearing crude armor and wielding a crude weapon.
stability: A humanoid creature with green skin, muscular build, and standing about 5 feet tall. It has prominent tusky teeth protruding from its lower lip, pointy ears, and glowing red eyes. It's dressed in crude, battle-worn armor, carrying a rough-hewn axe.
technical: This object is humanoid in shape, with a hunched posture and rough, blocky features. It is monochromatic, represented in a shade of grey on the screen. It is devoid of any additional items or accessories.

Title: Hill orc
default: This creature appears as a hulking, humanoid figure with coarse, greenish skin and muscular limbs. It has a brutish face featuring a pair of tusks protruding from its lower jaw and fiery red eyes. It's dressed in crude, makeshift armor and wields a primitive weapon, giving it an overall menacing look.
default_short: This entity appears as a small, muscular humanoid with greenish skin, coarse hair, and protruding tusks. It is often depicted wearing rough, primitive armor and wielding a crude weapon.
stability: The Hill orc is a humanoid creature with a muscular build, standing upright. It has green skin, red eyes, and is often depicted wearing rough leather armor and wielding a crude axe. Its features are brutish, with prominent tusks jutting from the lower jaw and coarse, black hair.
technical: The object appears as a medium-sized humanoid figure with a hunched posture, rendered in a simple, pixelated style. It has a distinct green colouration, symbolising its orcish nature. Its shape is rough and bulky, suggesting a muscular build, and it has two small red dots representing eyes.

Title: Mordor orc
default: This creature is a hulking, humanoid figure with a grotesque, snarling face featuring beady red eyes and sharp, yellowed teeth. Its skin is a dark, mottled grey, rough and scarred, stretched over a muscular frame. Dressed in ragged, dark armor, it wields a crude weapon, radiating a menacing aura.
default_short: This creature is a grotesque humanoid with greyish-green skin, pointy ears, and yellow eyes, often clad in crude armor and wielding primitive weapons. It has a hunched posture, sharp fangs protruding from its lower lip, and a generally menacing demeanor.
stability: A Mordor orc from NetHack is a humanoid creature with a grotesque, muscular build. It has greenish-grey skin, menacing red eyes, and sharp, protruding teeth. It is typically depicted with crude, dark armor and wielding a primitive weapon.
technical: This object appears as a humanoid figure with a hunched posture, exhibiting rough, greenish-brown skin. It is characterized by large, pointed ears, small, beady red eyes, and a wide mouth filled with sharp, yellow teeth. The figure is garbed in ragged, dark-coloured clothing, with no discernible weapons or items in its possession.

Title: Uruk-hai
default: This creature stands taller than a human, with a muscular build, greenish-brown skin, and sharp fangs. It is clad in dark, rugged armor, and wields a large, menacing weapon. Its eyes burn with a fierce, malevolent glow.
default_short: This creature appears as a large, muscular humanoid with a grotesque, orc-like face, standing around six and a half feet tall. Its skin is a dark, dirty gray, and it has sharp, yellowed teeth, small, beady red eyes, and is often depicted wearing ragged, dark-colored armor and wielding a crude weapon.
stability: A humanoid figure with orc-like features, standing tall with muscular build. Its skin is a dark, earthy brown, and it's equipped with crude, heavy armour and a large, menacing weapon. The Uruk-hai's eyes are red and it has a menacing expression, reflecting its aggressive nature.
technical: The object appears as a tall, humanoid figure with a muscular build, distinguished by its greyish skin tone. It has pointed ears, sharp teeth visible in its grimacing mouth, and glowing red eyes. Its form is naked and devoid of any items or weapons, revealing a rough, textured skin surface.

Title: Orc shaman
default: A hulking figure stands draped in rough-hewn robes, its green skin mottled and muscular. A bone necklace adorned with various talismans rests on its broad chest, and in its gnarled hands, it clutches a gnarled staff topped with a glowing, ethereal crystal. The creature's face is hidden beneath a low-hanging hood, save for two glowing red eyes that burn with an eerie, mystical light.
default_short: This figure appears as a brutish, green-skinned humanoid with tusks protruding from its lower jaw, dressed in primitive, earth-toned robes adorned with bone and claw trinkets. In one hand, it wields a gnarled wooden staff, while the other hand glows with a pulsating, ethereal energy.
stability: The Orc Shaman is a humanoid figure with green skin, standing upright. It is wearing tribal-style clothing and accessories, including a feathered headdress and carrying a wooden staff adorned with magical symbols. The shaman's eyes glow with a mystical light, and it has sharp teeth visible in a menacing grin.
technical: The object is humanoid in shape, standing upright with a hunched posture. It has a distinct green skin tone, with prominent tusky teeth protruding from its lower jaw and large, pointy ears. The object is clothed in simple, ragged garments that are primarily brown and black.

Title: Orc-captain
default: This formidable figure stands tall and muscular, with greenish, rough skin and small, beady red eyes. He is adorned in battle-worn, spiked armor and carries a large, intimidating battle-axe in one hand. His tusks protrude from his lower jaw, giving him a fearsome appearance.
default_short: This entity is a large, muscular humanoid with greenish skin, pointed ears, and sharp tusks protruding from its lower jaw. It is clad in dark, battle-worn armor and wields a hefty, blood-stained axe.
stability: The Orc-captain is a humanoid figure with a muscular build, standing upright. It has green skin, sharp tusks protruding from its lower jaw, and is clad in battle-worn, dark-coloured armour. In its hands, it wields a menacing, large battle-axe.
technical: The object appears as a humanoid figure, slightly larger than average, with a hunched posture and muscular build. It is primarily green in colour, a common characteristic of its species, with rough, textured skin. Its face is brutish, featuring prominent tusks and red eyes, and it is clad in crude, dark-coloured armour.

Title: Rock piercer
default: This object is a long, slender pickaxe with a sharp, pointed end designed for breaking through hard surfaces. It has a sturdy, wooden handle that offers a strong grip. The metal head is dark and rugged, showing signs of wear from repeated use.
default_short: This item appears as a long, slender, metallic pickaxe with a pointed tip designed for penetrating hard surfaces. Its handle is wrapped in a worn leather grip, adding contrast to the gleaming steel of the tool's business end.
stability: A Rock piercer from NetHack is a creature that resembles a stalactite. It has a conical shape, with a pointed tip at the bottom and a broader base at the top. Its colour is a mix of grey and brown, similar to a rock, and it has a rough, uneven surface.
technical: This object is a long, slender weapon with a pointed tip, similar to a spear or javelin, predominantly dark grey in colour. It features a smooth, metallic surface with the hint of a subtle shine, indicating its rock-piercing capabilities. The handle is slightly lighter in shade, offering a contrast to the darker body of the weapon.

Title: Iron piercer
default: This object appears as a long, slender metallic rod, with a sharp, pointed tip reminiscent of a spearhead. Its body is dark, resembling wrought iron, and it possesses a sturdy handle wrapped in worn leather for a firm grip. Despite its simplicity, it exudes a sense of danger and purpose, hinting at its destructive capabilities.
default_short: This item appears as a long, pointed metallic rod with a sharp tip, designed for piercing. Its iron body is dark grey, exhibiting an austere, rugged aesthetic.
stability: The Iron piercer is a cylindrical, elongated creature resembling a stalactite, primarily in shades of dark grey and black. It has a pointed end, which is used for attacking, and a smooth, metallic texture. No discernible features or appendages are present, emphasizing its stealth and simplicity.
technical: The object is a long, slender, and sharp tool, reminiscent of a spear or javelin. It has a dark, metallic appearance, consistent with being made entirely of iron. The object is smooth and unadorned, with a pointed tip designed for piercing.

Title: Glass piercer
default: This object is a long, slender dagger, with a blade that appears to be made entirely of translucent glass. It's hilt is wrapped in a dark, worn leather, contrasting sharply with the clear, almost delicate-looking blade. Despite its fragile appearance, the blade has a razor-sharp edge, glinting ominously in the light.
default_short: This object is a long, slender weapon, akin to a spear, made entirely of a transparent, glass-like material. It has a sharp, pointed tip designed for piercing, and a smooth, cylindrical handle.
stability: A Glass piercer is a sharp, pointed object resembling an icicle or stalactite, made entirely of transparent glass. It has a long, tapered shape, with a sharp point at one end and a broader base at the other. It glistens under light, reflecting multiple colors.
technical: This object appears as a slender, elongated weapon with a sharp point at one end, akin to a stylized dagger or stiletto. It is entirely made of a translucent material, resembling finely crafted, polished glass. The object emits a soft, ethereal glow, its color shifting subtly between shades of blue and green.

Title: Rothe
default: This creature resembles a large, muscular cow with a shaggy, dark brown coat. Its eyes gleam with a menacing intelligence, and two large, curved horns protrude from its head. Despite its bovine appearance, it moves with a surprising agility and grace.
default_short: This creature appears as a large, shaggy, quadrupedal mammal with long, curved horns and a humped back. Its coat is a dark brown, and its eyes have a wild, untamed look.
stability: The Rothe is a large, quadruped creature similar to a cow or yak, with two curved horns on its head. It has a thick, shaggy fur that is dark grey or black in color. Its eyes are bright, and it has a strong, muscular body.
technical: This object appears as a large, quadrupedal creature with a muscular body, covered in coarse, dark brown fur. It has a pair of long, curved horns protruding from its head and a tail flicking at its rear. Its eyes are small, beady and black, and it has a pair of large nostrils at the end of its snout.

Title: Mumak
default: This creature is a towering, elephant-like beast with a long, curved trunk and two enormous tusks. It has a thick, wrinkled, grey hide and large, round feet. It is also characterized by small, beady eyes and large, flapping ears.
default_short: This creature is a massive, elephant-like beast with a long, curved trunk and two large, pointed tusks. It has a thick, rough, grey skin and small eyes under a heavy brow.
stability: A Mumak is a massive, elephant-like creature from the game NetHack. It has a grayish-brown body, long curved tusks, and a long trunk. Its defining features include its large size, thick legs, and a small tail.
technical: This object appears as a large, elephant-like creature with a broad, rectangular body, long trunk and two curved tusks. It is depicted in a standing position, with four stout legs and a short tail. The object is monochromatic, typically represented in a shade of grey.

Title: Leocrotta
default: This creature appears as a large, hybrid beast with the body of a stag, a lion's tail, and a badger's head. Its mouth, wide and rectangular, is filled with sharp, bony ridges instead of teeth. Its sleek, muscular body is covered in a coarse, brown fur, and it moves with a swift, predatory grace.
default_short: This creature resembles a large, hybrid beast with the body of a stag, a lion's tail, a badger's head, and cloven hooves. Its mouth stretches unnaturally wide, revealing a ridge of bone instead of teeth.
stability: The Leocrotta is a large, beast-like creature with the body of a stag, the head of a badger, a broad mouth with sharp ridges instead of teeth, and a tail of a lion. It has a predominantly brown body with darker shades on the head and tail. Its fierce appearance is accentuated by piercing red eyes.
technical: The object appears as a quadrupedal creature, similar in shape to a large, robust deer but with a hyena-like body. It features a broad head with a wide, flat beak-like mouth and sharp, jagged teeth. Its overall colour is a mix of brown and grey.

Title: Wumpus
default: This creature is a large, furred beast with a pair of sharp tusks protruding from its mouth. It has beady eyes that glint with a predatory intelligence, and its hulking body is supported by four sturdy legs. Its overall appearance resembles a blend of a bear and a boar, exuding a menacing aura.
default_short: This creature appears as a large, furry, bear-like beast with sharp claws and fangs. Its eyes are glowing, adding an eerie aura to its intimidating presence.
stability: The Wumpus is a large, round creature with a smooth, dark brown body. It has two small, red eyes and a wide mouth filled with sharp, white teeth. It has short, stubby legs and no visible arms.
technical: The object appears as a large, furry creature with a round body shape, almost bear-like in stature. It has two small, beady eyes and a pair of sharp, curved horns protruding from its head. The creature is primarily brown in colour, with darker shades accentuating its features.

Title: Titanothere
default: This creature stands as a towering, prehistoric beast with a robust body covered in thick, leathery skin. Two enormous, curved horns protrude from its snout, pointing forward and slightly inward, adding to its intimidating presence. Its small eyes, large, rounded ears, and a long tail give it a distinct, ancient mammalian appearance.
default_short: This object is a large, prehistoric mammal with two pairs of blunt horn-like protrusions on its snout, and a bulky body similar to a rhinoceros. It has a thick, rough skin, short tail, and a small head relative to its body size.
stability: A Titanothere from NetHack is a large, quadruped creature with a robust body and two long, pointed horns protruding from its forehead. Its skin is a grayish color, similar to that of a rhinoceros. The creature has a powerful build, with muscular legs and a thick tail.
technical: The object is a large, quadrupedal creature, bearing resemblance to a prehistoric rhinoceros with two sets of large, curved horns protruding from its forehead and snout. It has a robust, barrel-shaped body, and its skin appears rough and grey. Its eyes are small and black, giving it a menacing appearance.

Title: Baluchitherium
default: This massive creature resembles a prehistoric rhinoceros, standing on four sturdy, pillar-like legs with broad, hoofed feet. Its elongated skull is topped with a pair of short, blunt horns, and a long neck extends forward to end in a small, rounded head with small ears and eyes. Its body, covered in thick, rough hide, is robust and barrel-shaped, tapering down to a relatively short tail.
default_short: This creature resembles an enormous, prehistoric rhinoceros without a horn, standing on four sturdy legs with a small head atop a long neck. It has a bulky, humpbacked body covered in thick, rough skin.
stability: A large, quadrupedal creature resembling a prehistoric rhinoceros without a horn. It has a long neck and head, and a robust body covered in grayish-brown fur. Notable features include its massive size, strong limbs with hoofed feet, and a small tail.
technical: The object is a large, quadrupedal creature with a hump-like structure on its back, resembling an oversized prehistoric rhinoceros without a horn. It is characterized by a long, downward-facing head and short, thick legs. The object is primarily grey in colour.

Title: Mastodon
default: This entity appears as a massive, prehistoric beast with long, curved tusks and a shaggy, brown coat of fur. Its large, humped body is supported by four sturdy legs, and a long, swinging trunk extends from its face. Its small, intelligent eyes peer out from beneath a heavy, domed forehead.
default_short: This entity is a large, prehistoric mammal with long, curved tusks and a humped back, covered in shaggy, brown hair. It has a long trunk and small eyes, resembling a massive, furry elephant.
stability: A large, grey, elephant-like creature with long, curved tusks and a long trunk. It has a hulking body with thick, wrinkled skin and small eyes. It's standing on four sturdy legs and has a small tail at the back.
technical: The object appears as a large, quadrupedal creature with a bulky, rounded body. It has long, curved tusks extending from its lower jaw and a long trunk. It is grey in colour.

Title: Sewer rat
default: This small creature is coated in slick, grimy fur that ranges from dark brown to black. Its beady eyes glint with a disturbing intelligence, and its whiskered snout twitches constantly, revealing sharp, yellowed teeth. Its long, scaly tail drags behind it, completing the image of a creature adapted to life in the filth and darkness.
default_short: This creature is a small, hunched rodent with beady red eyes and a long, hairless tail, its fur matted and grimy from dwelling in filthy environments. It has sharp, yellowed teeth protruding from its snout, used for gnawing and defense.
stability: A sewer rat from NetHack is a small, quadruped creature with a long, slender tail. It has a grey-brown body, beady red eyes, and large, rounded ears. Its fur appears scruffy and unkempt, reflecting its grimy, underground habitat.
technical: This object is a small, four-legged creature with a long, thin tail extending from its rear. Its body is covered in coarse, mottled brown fur, while its beady eyes shine a bright red. It has a pointed snout with tiny, sharp teeth visible when its mouth is open.

Title: Giant rat
default: This creature is a massive, menacing rodent with beady red eyes and sharp, gnarled teeth. Its coarse, matted fur ranges from dark grey to brown, blending seamlessly with its long, scaly tail. They often carry a staff or other symbolic item, and a holy symbol can usually be seen hanging around their neck. Their demeanor is one of devout concentration, often seen in prayer or deep thought.
default_short: This object appears as a humanoid figure, often clad in religious attire such as robes, with a holy symbol around its neck. It carries a staff or a book, suggesting a role of spiritual guidance or leadership.
stability: An Acolyte from NetHack is a humanoid figure, typically depicted in simple, monastic robes of muted colors like brown or gray. They often carry a staff or a book, symbolizing their scholarly and religious roles. Their overall appearance should convey a sense of humility and devotion.
technical: The object appears as a humanoid figure, standing upright with discernible head, torso, and limbs. It is entirely monochrome, rendered in a single shade of white against the game's black background. It has no distinguishing features or accessories, presenting a simplistic, almost stick-figure-like representation of a human.

Title: Hunter
default: This character appears as a rugged figure, often portrayed with a longbow and a quiver full of arrows slung over their shoulder. They wear sturdy boots, a cloak, and a wide-brimmed hat, typical of outdoor attire. Their eyes hold a sharp, focused look, indicating their readiness and alertness for the hunt.
default_short: The object is a long, slender projectile weapon with a sharp pointed tip at one end and feathers at the other, typically made from wood or metal. It is often paired with a bow for shooting.
stability: A hunter in NetHack is typically depicted as a human figure, wielding a bow and arrow. The character is often dressed in green and brown tones, symbolizing camouflage in the wilderness. Defining characteristics include a quiver of arrows on the back, a cap or hood, and sometimes a cloak.
technical: The object appears as a humanoid figure, rendered in ASCII art, typically represented by the "@" symbol. Its colour is not specified in the game, leaving it up to the player's imagination or the default colour settings of the terminal. Its shape is not detailed beyond the symbol, leaving no distinguishing features or accessories.

Title: Thug
default: A burly figure stands before you, clad in ragged clothing that barely conceals the muscular frame beneath. His face is obscured by a low slung hat, with a pair of cold, menacing eyes peering out from under the brim. In his hands, he tightly grips a crude but effective-looking weapon, ready for conflict.
default_short: A menacing figure clad in dark, shabby clothing, with a hardened face partially obscured by a low-brimmed hat. He carries a makeshift weapon, like a club or knife, and has a hunched posture that suggests readiness for a fight.
stability: A Thug from NetHack is a humanoid figure with a menacing stance. It is typically depicted in various shades of grey, with a black bandana covering the lower half of its face and holding a blunt weapon, like a club or a bat. Its attire consists of a plain shirt, pants, and boots.
technical: The object appears as a small, humanoid figure with a rough, blocky shape due to the pixelated graphics. It is primarily coloured in shades of grey and black, signifying a rough, ragged appearance. The object has no distinct features or accessories, presenting a generic, unadorned representation.

Title: Ninja
default: Cloaked in a black, form-fitting suit, this figure is nearly invisible in the shadows. Their face is obscured by a mask, leaving only their intense eyes visible. They are armed with a sharp, gleaming katana and a set of deadly shuriken.
default_short: This figure is clad in a black suit, covering everything but their eyes, and wields a sharp, straight-edged sword. They move with a swift, stealthy agility, almost blending into the shadows.
stability: A humanoid figure dressed in a black suit, covered from head to toe, revealing only the eyes. The figure is in a stealthy pose, holding a sharp, silver shuriken in one hand and a katana in the other. The background is a dimly lit dungeon, hinting at the game's setting.
technical: The object is humanoid in shape, standing upright with two arms and two legs. It is entirely black, representing the traditional garb of a ninja. It has no additional items or accessories, and its features are not distinguishable due to the lack of detail.

Title: Roshi
default: This object is a traditional Japanese robe, typically a shade of dark brown or black. It has wide sleeves and a loose fit, tied at the waist with a simple sash. The robe gives off an aura of serenity and wisdom, hinting at its association with a spiritual or philosophical figure.
default_short: This object is a long, thin staff made of polished wood, topped with a small, round crystal. It has intricate carvings along its length, depicting ancient symbols and characters.
stability: The Roshi object is a circular amulet with a bright yellow color, resembling a golden sun. It has intricate, symmetrical designs etched into its surface, including a small, centered eye. It emanates a faint, mystical glow.
technical: The object is a small, round, and flat item, similar in appearance to a traditional Asian straw hat. It is primarily beige in colour, with the edges slightly darker, suggesting a woven texture. It does not have any additional adornments or carry anything.

Title: Guide
default: A weathered, elderly figure, draped in a flowing robe with a high collar, clutches a staff topped with a glowing orb. Their eyes are obscured by a wide-brimmed hat adorned with mystical symbols. They carry a large, ancient book filled with maps and cryptic writings.
default_short: A figure clad in a simple, earth-toned robe holds a tall, wooden staff in one hand and an open, weathered book in the other. The individual's face is obscured by a low-hanging hood, adding an air of mystery to their overall appearance.
stability: A Guide from NetHack is a humanoid figure, standing upright with a slightly hunched posture. It is wearing a dark brown robe with a hood, holding a bright, glowing lantern in one hand and a long, sturdy walking stick in the other. The Guide's face is obscured by the shadow of the hood, creating an aura of mystery.
technical: This object appears as a small, rectangular shape with a symmetrical design, resembling a book. It is primarily white in colour, suggesting the presence of blank pages. There are no additional items or symbols indicating that it is carrying anything.

Title: Warrior

A battle-worn helmet sits atop his head, obscuring most of his face save for a pair of steely eyes. His muscular build and stern posture exude an aura of unyielding strength and resilience.

stability: A warrior from the game NetHack is a muscular, humanoid figure clad in metallic armor, carrying a sword and a shield. The warrior's face is partially obscured by a helmet, leaving only the eyes visible, which glow with a determined, fiery intensity.
technical: The object appears as a humanoid figure, standing upright with a muscular build, often represented in a monochromatic scheme of white or grey ASCII characters. Title: Apprentice
default: A novice in a specific craft, this figure is typically garbed in simple, unadorned clothing, reflecting their inexperience. They often carry basic tools relevant to their chosen field, such as a broom for a cleaner's apprentice or a small hammer for a blacksmith's apprentice. Their youthful features, eager expression, and awkward handling of their tools further underline their lack of expertise.
default_short: This object is a small, cylindrical piece of metal with a pointed end and a flat, circular base. It has a smooth, polished surface and is typically depicted in a bright, metallic color.
stability: A humanoid figure in medieval apprentice attire, predominantly in shades of blue and grey. The apprentice should be holding a magic wand or a book, symbolizing learning. The figure should have a youthful appearance, hinting at their novice status in the game.
technical: This object appears as a small, humanoid figure, rendered in simplistic pixel art. Its colouring is monochrome, alternating between black and white for contrast and depth. It is unadorned, without any carried items or additional details beyond its basic form.

Title: Invisible monster
default: This entity is a paradox, for it is entirely undetectable to the naked eye, leaving no trace of its presence or form. Its shape, size, and features remain a mystery, hidden behind a veil of absolute invisibility. All that may suggest its existence is the slight distortion of light or the subtle manipulation of its surroundings.
default_short: This entity is impossible to visually perceive as it lacks any physical form or color, making it blend perfectly with its surroundings. Its presence can only be inferred through its interactions with the environment.
stability: An ethereal, transparent creature with a vague humanoid form, revealing only faint distortions in the air. The monster should have menacing aura and give off a chilling vibe. The surrounding environment should subtly reflect its presence.
technical: The object is not visible to the naked eye, therefore it does not have discernible shape, size, or colour. Its presence can only be inferred by its interaction with the environment. It carries no items or accessories.

It is roughly the size of a human fist and has an unusual weight, feeling heavier than it appears. When observed closely, faint symbols or glyphs can be seen embedded within the stone, their meaning elusive.
default_short: This object is a small, irregularly shaped item with a rough surface, appearing to be made of an unknown, possibly extraterrestrial material. It has a peculiar, shifting color scheme that defies identification, making it seem otherworldly and enigmatic.
stability: A Strange object from NetHack is a small, rectangular item with sharp edges and corners. It is primarily a dark grey color, giving it a metallic appearance. It has various arcane symbols etched into its surface, glowing in a faint blue color.
technical: The object is a small, irregularly shaped artifact, reminiscent of a distorted pyramid with multiple off-shooting tendrils. It is primarily black, but it seems to shimmer and shift with an array of colors when viewed from different angles. The surface is smooth and glossy, appearing almost liquid-like under certain light conditions.

It is designed to be launched from a bow, with the fletching providing stability during flight. The metallic tip is sharp and designed for penetration.

stability: The arrow object is a simple, straight, elongated object with a sharp pointed tip on one end and fletching on the other. The pointed head is also typically lighter than the body, often represented in a shade of grey.

It covers the torso and upper legs, and sometimes includes a hood or coif for head protection. Despite its heavy appearance, it is designed to allow for reasonable flexibility and movement.
default_short: This object is a piece of armor made of small metal rings linked together in a pattern to form a mesh. It covers the torso and upper legs, with sleeves extending down to the wrists, providing substantial protection.
stability: A metallic, interlinked chain mail armor from the game NetHack. It's a shimmering silver-grey color with a detailed, tightly woven pattern. The armor is designed to fit the torso and arms, appearing heavy and sturdy.
technical: This object appears as a series of small, interlocking metal rings arranged to form a flexible and durable protective layer. The structure is shaped to fit the human torso, with extensions for the arms, and has a dull silver-grey colour. It is devoid of any additional adornments or carried items, focusing purely on its functional design.

It is designed to cover the torso and has a slightly tapered shape, wider at the shoulders and narrower at the waist. The metal rings give the armor a textured, almost scale-like appearance.

stability: A Scale mail object from NetHack is a piece of body armor. It is depicted as a shirt made of overlapping metallic scales, typically in shades of gray or silver. The armor should have a rugged, durable appearance with a slightly shiny texture due to its metal composition.
technical: This object appears as a piece of body armor, comprised of small, overlapping metal scales, arranged in a cascading pattern to form a protective shell. The shape of the object is roughly humanoid, designed to cover the torso, with a slight curve for the chest and back, and openings for the arms and neck. The color of the metal scales is a dull, weathered silver, with a slightly reflective surface.

technical: This object is rectangular with a slightly curved surface, reflecting light as a typical mirror would. It has a thin, silver border surrounding the reflective surface. Its back is flat and non-reflective, typically of a darker colour.

Title: Crystal ball

The lenses are slightly convex, giving them a bulging appearance, and the frame is typically silver or gold in color. Title: Blindfold

technical: This object is a rectangular piece of cloth, predominantly black in colour. It is designed to be tied around the head, covering the eyes completely. The cloth is smooth, with no visible patterns or markings.

Title: Towel
default: This is a rectangular piece of fabric, typically white in color, with a soft, absorbent texture. It is medium-sized, large enough to wrap around one's body but small enough to fold and carry easily. It has fringed or hemmed edges, giving it a clean, finished look.

Title: Leash

Title: Stethoscope
default: This object is a long, thin medical instrument typically made of metal, with a small, flat disc at one end and earpieces at the other. The disc, used for auscultation, is typically covered with a thin, flexible diaphragm. The metal tube, which is often flexible, connects the disc to the earpieces, allowing sound to travel from the patient to the listener's ears.

stability: The stethoscope is a small, handheld object with a circular listening device connected to two thin, curved metal tubes that extend into earpieces. default_short: This object is a standard-sized, cylindrical writing tool, often depicted in black or vibrant colors. It has a pointed tip for marking and is usually capped when not in use.

default: This object appears as a small, square tile marked with a grid, indicating a specific point within a larger map. It is typically represented in a monochromatic color scheme, often white or grey. The tile itself is unadorned, with its primary purpose being to denote a specific, accessible location within the larger environment.
default_short: This object is a square tile on a grid, typically depicted as a period or dot, representing a location in a two-dimensional space. It can be empty or occupied by characters, items, or environmental features.
stability: The object is a rectangular, flat tile, predominantly blue in color, symbolizing a valid position in the game. It features a white border and a distinct white tick or check mark in the center. It is typically used to mark valid moves or positions within the game's grid-based system.
technical: As a non-physical entity in the game, the Valid position object does not have a specific visual representation, shape, or colour. It is a conceptual object used to define a permissible location within the game's grid-based system. Its appearance is determined by whatever entity or terrain occupies that position.

Title: Vibrating square
default: This object appears as a pulsating square, its edges constantly shifting and blurring as if resonating with an unseen energy. The square emits a subtle, almost imperceptible glow, adding to its otherworldly appearance. Despite its simple geometric shape, the object seems to defy spatial logic with its constant motion and vibrational frequency.
default_short: It appears as a single, pulsating square tile on the ground, which intermittently emits subtle, rhythmic vibrations. Its color and material seem indistinguishable from the surrounding floor.
stability: A square object that appears to vibrate or shimmer, suggesting motion. The object is primarily solid black, with white or grey outlines to indicate its shape and movement. It's characterized by its sharp, geometric edges, mimicking the pixelated graphics of the game NetHack.
technical: The object is a square shape that continuously fluctuates in size, giving the impression of constant vibration. It is uniformly black in color, providing a stark contrast to its surroundings. It does not possess any additional features or carry any items, its entire visual essence is encompassed by its shape and color.
